name: Nichny
description: The Nichny is a medium-sized fey creature known for its cunning intelligence and magical abilities. It has a natural armor that grants it a high armor class.
memorable: The Nichny excels at manipulating luck, granting allies advantages and imposing disadvantages on enemies.
goals: To use its luck-manipulating abilities to influence battles in its favor and confuse opponents.
environment: Typically found in enchanted forests or mystical realms.
strengths: Possesses high intelligence, dexterity, and charisma, making it adept at both combat and social interactions.
attacks: Can execute claws attacks dealing slashing and force damage, or use Luck-Stealing Bolts to impose disadvantages.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Luck enhances allies' attacks and hinders enemies' effectiveness.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics, Insight, Perception, and Stealth, showcasing its agility and awareness.
additional_information: Grants allies a luck bonus on saving throws within its aura.
Has Magic Resistance for spell defenses.
Can create Lucky Stones providing a saving throw bonus.
Can teleport up to 120 feet as a tactical maneuver.
test_queries: mysterious creature with aura of luck
cunning fey that creates lucky stones
magical fey known for deception and fortune
